formElement.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 200 IDs of the work items to get.
formElement.label: Work Item IDs:

formElement.documentation: Request only the fields specified in a list (comma-separated, up to 100) for a work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned. e.g. 'System.State, System.IterationPath, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StateChangeDate, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority'

Request only the fields specified in a list (comma-separated, up to 100) for a work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned. e.g. 'System.State, System.IterationPath, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StateChangeDate, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority'
formElement.label: Fields:

formElement.documentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.label: As of (date):

formElement.documentation: Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks, file attachements, etc.). Some of the types are not supported by the TFS API.
formElement.label: Expand relationships:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:
